summary: 该接口用于查看DBS支持地域。

schema.description: 用于保证请求的幂等性，防止重复提交请求。由客户端生成该参数值，要保证在不同请求间唯一，最大值不超过64个ASCII字符，且该参数值中不能包含非ASCII字符。

ErrMessage.example: This backupPlan can't support this action

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "HttpStatusCode": 400,
  "RequestId": "EB4DFD5E-3618-498D-BE35-4DBEA0072122",
  "ErrCode": "InvalidParameter",
  "Success": true,
  "ErrMessage": "This backupPlan can't support this action",
  "Regions": {
    "RegionCode": [
      "cn-hangzhou"
    ]
  }
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<DescribeRegionsResponse>
    <RequestId>EB4DFD5E-3618-498D-BE35-4DBEA0072122</RequestId>
    <HttpStatusCode>400</HttpStatusCode>
    <Regions>
        <RegionCode/>
    </Regions>
    <ErrMessage>This backupPlan can't support this action</ErrMessage>
    <Success>true</Success>
    <ErrCode>InvalidParameter</ErrCode>
</DescribeRegionsResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 查看DBS支持地域
